# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s)
    current_line_length = 0
    wrapped_string = ""
    
    for word in words
        word_length = length(word)
        
        if current_line_length + word_length > text_width
            wrapped_string *= "\n"
            current_line_length = 0
        end
        
        wrapped_string *= word * " "
        current_line_length += word_length + 1
    end
    
    return wrapped_string
end

# Example
s = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(s, text_width=15)
println(wrapped_text)
```
